register.title: Create Account
register.description: Your connections are just a few steps away.
register.errorMessage: Registration failed. Please check your information.

privacy.privacyText: Privacy is a matter of trust, and your trust is important to us. We respect you and your privacy. Therefore, we ensure the protection and legal handling of your personal data.
privacy.privacyCheck: Yes, I agree to the terms and conditions.

login.title: Connexion à votre compte
login.description: Entrez votre email et votre mot de passe ci-dessous pour vous connecter

verifyEmail.title: Verify email
verifyEmail.description: Please verify your email address by clicking on the link we just emailed to you.
verifyEmail.linkSent: A new verification link has been sent to the email address you provided during registration.

forgot.title: Forgot password
forgot.description: Enter your email to receive a password reset link

CALENDAR.TITLE: Training calendar
CALENDAR.DESCRIPTION: Check our upcoming sessions and register.
